sn12.53:4.2: “There are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the gratification provided by these things, your craving grows.
sn12.53:4.3: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn12.53:4.4: Grasping is a condition for future existence.
sn12.53:4.5: Future existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn12.53:4.6: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn12.53:4.7: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
sn12.53:5.1: Suppose an oil lamp depended on oil and a wick to burn.
sn12.53:5.2: And from time to time someone would pour oil in and adjust the wick.
sn12.53:5.3: Fueled and sustained by that, the oil lamp would burn for a long time.
sn12.53:5.4: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the gratification provided by these things, your craving grows.
sn12.53:5.5: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn12.53:5.6: Grasping is a condition for future existence.
sn12.53:5.7: Future existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn12.53:5.8: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn12.53:5.9: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
sn12.53:6.1: There are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the drawbacks of these things, your craving ceases.
sn12.53:6.3: When grasping ceases, future existence ceases.
sn12.53:6.4: When future existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn12.53:6.5: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn12.53:6.6: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.53:7.1: Suppose an oil lamp depended on oil and a wick to burn.
sn12.53:7.2: And no-one would pour oil in and adjust the wick from time to time.
sn12.53:7.3: As the original fuel is used up and no more is added, the oil lamp would be extinguished due to lack of fuel.
sn12.53:7.4: In the same way, there are things that are prone to being fettered. When you concentrate on the drawbacks of these things, your craving ceases.
sn12.53:7.6: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.”
